participant_1.background:
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
i am an avid fan of the boston celtics.
i like to listen to rap music.
i am in grad school.
i love to bake.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest where the summers are hot and the watermelon is sweet.
I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway.
I enjoy comfort foods like macaroni and cheese, mashed potatoes, and chicken pot pie.
i will study computer science.
I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Hello there! I'm doing some research on computer science for my upcoming classes. How about you?
I'm doing some baking to relax and de-stress before starting my grad school classes.
Oh wow, what kind of things do you like to bake?
I love to make chocolate chip cookies, brownies, and apple pies.
Those all sound delicious! I'm a bit of a comfort food person myself, I love macaroni and cheese, mashed potatoes, and chicken pot pie.
I love all of those things too! I think it's because they remind me of my childhood.
Me too! I grew up in the Midwest where the summers were hot and the watermelon was sweet. I have a lot of great memories from my childhood.
That sounds like a wonderful place to grow up. I'm from New York City, so it's very different here.
I've always wanted to visit New York City! It seems like such a vibrant and exciting place.
It definitely is! I love living here, but it can be a bit overwhelming at times.
I can imagine! But I'm sure it's worth it to experience all that the city has to offer.
It definitely is! I love meeting new people from all over the world.
Me too! I think that's one of the best things about traveling
